name: Felipe Franciosi
bio: has been a Senior Software Performance Engineer working for Citrix since October 2011, more specifically on XenServer Storage Virtualisation. Previously, he finished a PhD at Imperial College London on the same subject. Regarding computing and besides performance evaluation of virtualised storage, his interests also include computer networks, distributed systems and high performance computing to name but a few. In his spare time he enjoys playing his bass guitars, practicing Kyokushin Karate and doing close-up magic. Oh, and playing Poker and Chess.
